text: Paola Fantato is an Italian retired archer. She was born on 13 September 1959. Fantato competed at the 1996 Summer Olympics.Paola FantatoPaola FANTATO == References == Category:1959 births Category:Italian archers Category:Olympians for Italy Category:Living people Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Italy Category:Paralympic gold medalists for Italy Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Italy Category:Sportspeople from Verona
title: Paola Fantato
